_header: Minot with mouth had meaned to make
Subjects: historical poems; Sluys, sea battle at
_description: The Sea Fight at Sluys, by Laurence Minot — 88 lines in couplets

BlCottGalEIX.First Lines:
Minot with mowth had menid to makesuth sawesamp; sad for sum mens
                    sake…
BlCottGalEIX.Last Lines:
…þus blinned þaire boste als we wele kenGod assoyle
                    þaire sawis sais all Amen
BlCottGalEIX.Attributed Title:
Lithes and þe batail I sal bigyn / of inglisch men & normandes in
                    þe swyn (rubric couplet as heading, f. 53vb, by
                    scribe)
